title: Mobile Learning-Based Mathematical Language Intervention Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners are intermediate-level students facing linguistic challenges in mathematical problem-solving, operating in environments enabling asynchronous learning via smartphones/tablets

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical terminology and problem-solving processes in linguistic contexts using a mobile learning platform
Learners improve mathematical reasoning skills by performing step-by-step language intervention activities according to constructivist scaffolding strategies
Learners enhance learning efficiency by 30% or more by integrating digital resources with traditional learning materials in a blended learning environment

resources: Digital Workbook for Mathematical Language Intervention
Formative Assessment Tool with Built-in Automatic Scoring System

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
